Google Chrome Frame without admin rights

Posted on 11 May 2011
[embed]http://youtube.com/watch?v=3YkEUpJQP3o[/embed]

I can't even start to describe how excited I am about this. Not only does Chrome Frame now install without requiring administrative rights, it also installs without restarting Internet Explorer and can be installed via an MSI installer. This is perfect for the National Park Service, as we can deploy Chrome Frame via group policy.

Now I just need to convince IT that this is a worthwhile effort.
